name: @outbreaklens/database
description: Database layer for OutbreakLens - Prisma schema and utilities

scripts.push: powershell -Command "Copy-Item '../web/.env.local' '.env' -Force; npx prisma db push; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.migrate: powershell -Command "Copy-Item '../web/.env.local' '.env' -Force; npx prisma migrate dev; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.migrate:deploy: powershell -Command "Copy-Item '../web/.env.local' '.env' -Force; npx prisma migrate deploy; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
scripts.seed: powershell -Command "Copy-Item '../web/.env.local' '.env' -Force; npx prisma db seed; Remove-Item '.env' -Force"
